t: What is Amazon Manufacturer Part Number? - Seller Updates
s: Amazon uses manufacturer part numbers as a unique identifier to find specific products. we also have other unique identifiers such as gtin,upc, and ean. for amazon, this is an optional field in the inventory listing section and it is not applicable to all types of products.
